function.name: command_control_tool
function.description: Send commands to devices to control their behavior (set, change, turn on, turn off)

tool.description: NuCore tool hooking to send commands to devices to control their behavior

device.description: The **id** for the **device** in DEVICE STRUCTURE.

command.description: The **id** for the **Accept Command** for the **device** in DEVICE STRUCTURE.

parameters.description: List of parameters for the command.

items.description: A parameter for the **command**. If no parameters defined, leave empty

id.description: The **id** for the parameter from for the **command**. If none, use n/a

value.description: Always a number. See **GLOBAL CUSTOMER VALUE CONVERSION RULES**.

uom.description: Must use the **uom_id** for the parameter from DEVICE STRUCTURE.

precision.description: The precision for the parameter value.
